channel.title: Javascript on greenLand
channel.description: Recent content in Javascript on greenLand

item.title: Generate Headers for your log by Browser Console
item.description: I resume my habit of logging down coding activity, and then I see the importance of generating headers. I. List of days This snippet is an application of what I have learnt from Chapter 2 of《Eloquent JavaScript》. This javaScript snippet gives you a list of days for 100-days-of-code log. code var container = ""; for (i=34; i<65; i++) { container += "### Day " + i + ":" + "\n"; } console.

item.title: Learning `map()` in javaScript
item.description: Reference Date Title Author URL 2017-05-31 Master Map & Filter, Javascript’s Most Powerful Array Functions Arnav Aggarwal Link 2014-02-24 how do you pass an array as a parameter in a function? Dave McFarland Link Summary This article adopts a specific-to-abstract 4-stage approach to explain array functions. A quasi-map function is developed from multiplying each items in arr by 3.
